certificate.title: Stand Out with BE’s Certificate
certificate.descLine1: Complete all the modules successfully to obtain this certificate of recognition.
certificate.descLine2: ✓ BE’s certificates serve as a testament to the knowledge & skills you have gained.
certificate.descLine3: ✓ Increase your credibility by adding it to your resume and sharing it with your LinkedIn network.(you need to complete all the modules successfully to obtain this certificate of recognition)
